1. City Council

City Council
============

* January - October
  + 2nd and 4th Thursday of each month
* November - December
  + 1st and 3rd Thursday of each month
* City Hall
  319 Main Street
  City Council Chambers
  Sultan, WA 98294

City Council agendas are available online typically the Friday afternoon prior to the meeting and at the meeting itself. Minutes of the meeting are recorded and reviewed at the following Council meeting. Once approved, the minutes are available for the public. Minutes and approved ordinances can be found in the Council meeting packets.

View Most Recent Agendas and Minutes

Public comments are welcome at all City Council meetings. Meetings begin with a public comment period where citizens can speak on any City-related topic. Citizens may also comment on specific agenda items during the meeting. Your comments should generally be limited to 3 minutes in length.

Remote Public Comment Registration Form

Starting in January 2024 all community members who wish to participate in virtual public comment during City meetings are required to register on the City website beforehand. This new registration process is designed to streamline and enhance the virtual public comment experience for everyone involved.

To comment virtually, please click here to register
. All virtual comment registrations
.

If you would like to submit written comments to be included at the meeting, you must email them to
[tami.pevey@sultanwa.gov](mailto:tami.pevey@sultanwa.gov)
. Written comments

Public hearings offer particular opportunities for citizens to comment on important issues such as new ordinances, City budget, comprehensive plan amendments or adoption, and interlocal agreements.
